table.name: invoice
table.description: One record per invoice. Main invoice table.  Currently, an invoice relates to billing of one shipment, but in the future, multiple shipments may be consolidated onto an invoice.  GC3 can populate this table from a shipment, or the invoice information can be fed into the system directly.   An invoice is a relative term - a bill and an invoice look the same, but the person who receives it ('BILL TO' involved party) would consider it an invoice and the person generating it ('SERVICE PROVIDER' party) would consider it a bill.

columns.name: INVOICE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the invoice.

columns.name: INVOICE_XID
columns.description: The XID for the invoice.

columns.name: INVOICE_TYPE
columns.description: Indicates whether this is a bill or an invoice (valid values are 'I' or 'B'). INVOICE_TYPE indicates whether this is a bill or an invoice (valid values are 'I' or 'B').

columns.name: INVOICE_SOURCE
columns.description: Valid values are G, I, M.

columns.name: ENTERED_BY_GL_USER_GID
columns.description: Identifies which GL user entered the invoice into the system.

columns.name: INVOICE_NUMBER
columns.description: Indicates the number that was assigned to the invoice.

columns.name: SERVPROV_ALIAS_QUAL_GID
columns.description: Identifies the service provider qualifier (such as SCAC), which is then associated with the value in servprov_alias_value.

columns.name: SERVPROV_ALIAS_VALUE
columns.description: Identifies service provider that handled the shipment related to the invoice. The qualifier servprov_alias_qual_gid qualifies the value, which can be a scec code, or another descriptor for the service provider.

columns.name: CORRECTION_CODE_ID
columns.description: Correction code identifier.

columns.name: INVOICE_DATE
columns.description: The date of the invoice.

columns.name: CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The GID for currency.

columns.name: NET_AMOUNT_DUE
columns.description: The net amount that is due for the invoice.

columns.name: NET_AMOUNT_DUE_GID
columns.description: The net amount due GID.

columns.name: NET_AMOUNT_BASE
columns.description: The amount that is due in the base currency.

columns.name: NET_DUE_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the net amount for the invoice is due.

columns.name: PAYMENT_METHOD_CODE_GID
columns.description: The method of payment that is expected for the invoice. Examples include: check, cash on deliver, credit card and electronic funds transfer.

columns.name: START_DATE
columns.description: The start range for which this invoice was generated.

columns.name: END_DATE
columns.description: The end range for which this invoice was generated.

columns.name: INVOICE_SERVICE_CODE_GID
columns.description: The type of service that was performed. Foreign key to INVOICE_SERVICE_CODE.

columns.name: INCO_TERM_GID
columns.description: The terms of sale for this particular invoice.

columns.name: DISCOUNT_AMOUNT
columns.description: The total dollar amount of any discounts applied to the invoice.

columns.name: DISCOUNT_AMOUNT_GID
columns.description: The discount amount GID.

columns.name: DISCOUNT_AMOUNT_BASE
columns.description: The amount of the discount in the base currency.

columns.name: DISCOUNT_PERCENTAGE
columns.description: Either a specific amount for the discount or a percentage to be used for the discount.

columns.name: DISCOUNT_DAYS_DUE
columns.description: The number of days in the terms discount period by which payment is due if the terms of the discount are to be earned.

columns.name: DISCOUNT_DUE_DATE
columns.description: The date that the payment must be made by in order for the discount to be earned.

columns.name: ORIGIN_STATION_CITY
columns.description: The city in which the related shipment began.

columns.name: ORIGIN_STATION_FSAC
columns.description: The FSAC code for the station in which the related shipment began.

columns.name: ORIGIN_STATION_SPLC
columns.description: The SPLC code for the station in which the related shipment began.

columns.name: ORIGIN_STATION_PROVINCE_CODE
columns.description: The province code in which the related shipment began.

columns.name: ORIGIN_STATION_POSTAL_CODE
columns.description: The postal code in which the related shipment began.

columns.name: ORIGIN_COUNTRY_CODE3_GID
columns.description: The origin country code GID.

columns.name: DEST_STATION_CITY
columns.description: The city in which the related shipment ends.

columns.name: DEST_STATION_FSAC
columns.description: The FSAC code for the station in which the related shipment ended.

columns.name: DEST_STATION_SPLC
columns.description: The SPLC code for the destination of the shipment which relates to this invoice.

columns.name: DEST_STATION_PROVINCE_CODE
columns.description: The province code in which the related shipment ended.

columns.name: DEST_STATION_POSTAL_CODE
columns.description: The postal code in which the related shipment ended.

columns.name: DEST_COUNTRY_CODE3_GID
columns.description: The destination country code GID.

columns.name: LETTER_OF_CREDIT_EXP_DATE
columns.description: The date until which the letter of credit is in effect. After this date, the letter of credit expires.

columns.name: LETTER_OF_CREDIT_ISSUE_DATE
columns.description: The date that the letter of credit was issued.

columns.name: LETTER_OF_CREDIT_NUMBER
columns.description: The identification number of the letter of credit.

columns.name: VESSEL_CODE_QUALIFIER
columns.description: The qualifier for the vessel.

columns.name: VESSEL_CODE
columns.description: The vessel that was used for the shipment that relates to the invoice.

columns.name: VESSEL_COUNTRY_CODE3_GID
columns.description: The vessel country code GID.

columns.name: VESSEL_GID
columns.description: Vessel ID for the invoice.

columns.name: VES_OP_SERVPROV_ALIAS_QUAL_GID
columns.description: The vessel operator service provider alias qualifier GID.

columns.name: VES_OP_SERVPROV_ALIAS_VALUE
columns.description: Service provider alias of the vessel operator.

columns.name: VOYAGE_NUMBER
columns.description: The number of the voyage that relates to the shipment for which this invoice is being created.

columns.name: PARENT_INVOICE_GID
columns.description: The parent invoice GID.

columns.name: DATE_RECEIVED
columns.description: The date the invoice was received.

columns.name: INDICATOR
columns.description: Indicators are icons that can be assigned to business objects in search Results pages and other lists to mark the condition or state of a business object. You can use indicators to mark the history, status or any other condition of a business object. For example, in the Shipment Manager you could use the green marker to indicate buy shipments for which tender has been accepted.

columns.name: SUPPLY_COUNTRY_CODE3_GID
columns.description: The Supply Country Code ID represents the country that the goods are coming from.

columns.name: SERVPROV_VAT_REG_NO_GID
columns.description: The service provider VAT Registration ID is the VAT tax ID for the service provider.

columns.name: CUSTOMER_VAT_REG_NO_GID
columns.description: The Customer VAT Registration ID is the VAT tax ID for the customer.

columns.name: VAT_EXEMPT_VALUE
columns.description: The VAT Exempt field is used when the bill is exempt from the tax. When it is checked, you need to specify whether the bill is Exempt with Credit or Exempt without Credit.

columns.name: NET_AMT_DUE_WITH_TAX
columns.description: The Amount Due with VAT is the total amount due plus any applicable value added taxes (VAT).

columns.name: NET_AMT_DUE_W_TAX_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The currency qualifier for the amount due.

columns.name: NET_AMT_DUE_WITH_TAX_BASE
columns.description: The net amount due in the base currency.

columns.name: IS_PASS_THROUGH
columns.description: The Pass Through check box allows to the invoice to be approved for payment without being matched to a shipment.

columns.name: CONSOLIDATION_TYPE
columns.description: The value is set based on the invoice type involved - there are three consolidation types- STANDARD for a stand-alone invoice, PARENT for a parent invoice (for example, a consolidation invoice), or CHILD for a child invoice.

columns.name: IS_FIXED_COST
columns.description: The Fixed Cost check box allows you to override the amount due calculation. When checked the amount due that you enter will be used regardless of the base and other charges.

columns.name: BASE_CHARGE
columns.description: The Base Charge is the sum of the shipping charges for the invoice.

columns.name: BASE_CHARGE_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The currency qualifier for the base charge.

columns.name: BASE_CHARGE_BASE
columns.description: Base amount due in the base currency.

columns.name: OTHER_CHARGE
columns.description: The Other Charge is the sum of the accessorial and other non-shipping charges for the invoice.

columns.name: OTHER_CHARGE_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The GID for the currency associated with the other charges.

columns.name: OTHER_CHARGE_BASE
columns.description: The other base charge.

columns.name: IS_CREDIT_NOTE
columns.description: Indicates if this invoice is a credit note

columns.name: USER_DEFINED1_ICON_GID
columns.description: Can store a user-defined icon that will appear within the user interface to help visually identify attributes of the invoice.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED2_ICON_GID
columns.description: Can store a user-defined icon that will appear within the user interface to help visually identify attributes of the invoice.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED3_ICON_GID
columns.description: Can store a user-defined icon that will appear within the user interface to help visually identify attributes of the invoice.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED4_ICON_GID
columns.description: Can store a user-defined icon that will appear within the user interface to help visually identify attributes of the invoice.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED5_ICON_GID
columns.description: Can store a user-defined icon that will appear within the user interface to help visually identify attributes of the invoice.

columns.name: EXCHANGE_RATE_DATE
columns.description: Indicates the date to be used for any currency conversions; if null, the latest conversion should be used.

columns.name: EXCHANGE_RATE_GID
columns.description: Indicates the set of exchange rates to use for currency conversions; if null, the default set should be used

columns.name: SERVPROV_GID
columns.description: The GID for the service provider.

columns.name: SAIL_DATE
columns.description: The sail date is the date the vessel sails.

columns.name: SAIL_CUTOFF_DATE
columns.description: The sail cutoff date is the latest date in which you can get your cargo onto the vessel.

columns.name: RAIL_DATE
columns.description: The rail date is the date when a container gets put on rail car.

columns.name: IS_HAZARDOUS
columns.description: Indicator for identifying whether the invoiced shipment was or was not identified as carrying hazardous or dangerous goods.

columns.name: IS_TEMPERATURE_CONTROL
columns.description: Indicator for identifying whether the invoiced shipment was or was not identified as requiring temperature control.

columns.name: INVOICING_PROCESS
columns.description: N/A

columns.name: IS_VAT_ANALYSIS_FIXED
columns.description: Indicates if the VAT Analysis is fixed (user entered) and the system should not try to calculate it.

columns.name: ORIGINAL_INVOICE_GID
columns.description: For supplemental bills. This references the original bill.

columns.name: DISCOUNT_AMT_FN
columns.description: Functional currency amount for the discount amount. A functional currency is a standardized amount as specified in domain settings. It is also stored in the database and is intended to be used as an accounting currency.

columns.name: DISCOUNT_AMT_FN_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The GID for discount amount functional currency.

columns.name: NET_AMOUNT_DUE_FN
columns.description: The functional currency amount for the net amount due.

columns.name: NET_AMOUNT_DUE_FN_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The GID for the net amount due functional currency.

columns.name: NET_AMT_W_TAX_FN
columns.description: The functional currency amount for net amount due with tax.

columns.name: NET_AMT_W_TAX_FN_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The GID for currency for the net amount due with VAT functional currency.

columns.name: BASE_CHARGE_FN
columns.description: The functional currency amount for the base charge.

columns.name: BASE_CHARGE_FN_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The GID for currency for the base charge in the functional currency.

columns.name: OTHER_CHARGE_FN
columns.description: The functional currency amount for other charge.

columns.name: OTHER_CHARGE_FN_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The GID for currency.

columns.name: GL_DATE
columns.description: GL Date for the invoice as set by agent or manual action.

columns.name: MARKED_FOR_PURGE
columns.description: A Boolean field. When it is set to 'Y', this row and its child data will be purged.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: INVOICE_RULE_GID
columns.description: The rule ID used for generating this invoice/bill.

columns.name: INV_CONS_CONSTRAINT_SET_GID
columns.description: Constraint Set ID is used for creating a consolidated invoice/bill. This will be used for identifying the parent invoice/bill when you add more invoices/bills with the same constraint set.
